lpLockedDays.description: Liquidity pool must be locked for at least 90 days

ownerIsMultisig.description: Ownership must be multisig or renounced

maxTax.description: Maximum buy/sell tax must not exceed 5%

noBlacklistAfterTGE.description: Blacklist functions must be disabled after TGE

noTradingBlocker.description: Contract must not indefinitely block trading

noProxyOrLockedProxy.description: Contract must not use or must lock proxy
